SEARCH
Module com.projet.da.projet_da
Package com.projet.da50.projet_da50.controller.lesson

Class LessonController

java.lang.Object
com.projet.da50.projet_da50.controller.lesson.LessonController
public class LessonController extends Object
The LessonController class manages the creation, validation, and retrieval of Lesson objects. It interacts with the Hibernate ORM to store and retrieve lesson data from the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    LessonController()
    Default constructor, initializing a new Lesson and configuring Hibernate SessionFactory.

    Constructor with an existing Lesson to be managed by this controller.
